LanguageData.RS_Best_Sex_Partner_ToolTip: The partner who had most satisfying sex.
LanguageData.RS_PawnLockDesc: Lock displayed pawn.\n\nWhen unlocked, window will automatically switch to a currently selected pawn.
LanguageData.RSOption_2_Desc: Set how much lust affect to sex drive.
LanguageData.RSOption_8_Desc: Set limitation of lust.\nIf absolute value of lust close to or larger than this value, lust will be less likely to change.
LanguageData.RSOption_MaxSingleLustChange_Desc: Set how much lust can change from a single sex act
LanguageData.RSOption_SexCanFillBuckets_Desc: If enabled boobjobs, footjobs and handjobs that happens near cum bucket will fill it
LanguageData.RSOption_3_Desc: Set maximum deviation of lust. The lust value can be negative depending on its average.
LanguageData.RSOption_5_Desc: Set maximum deviation of sex count.
LanguageData.RSOption_7_Desc: Slaves will have experience of being raped
LanguageData.RSOption_9_Desc: Set minimum sexable age. This value is not related to RJW's minimum sex age. Only used for generating records.
LanguageData.RSOption_10_Desc: Set probability of virgin regardless of age.
LanguageData.RSOption_MinSexableFromLifestage_Label: Minimum sexable age from life stages
LanguageData.RSOption_MinSexableFromLifestage_Desc: Only used for generating records. Get minimum sexable age from the first reproductive life stage. Works better for the races with a long lifespan
LanguageData.RSOption_EnableBastardRelation_Desc: Child is marked as a bastard if they have only one parent or their parents are not (or was not) married
LanguageData.RSOption_EnableSexHistory_Desc:
* Needs a game restart

Enables Sex History window, information collection for the said window and save/load of this information. Also enables sex partners count in the pawn's records.

[Caution] Disabling this mid save will result in the loss of previously collected histories.
LanguageData.RSOption_HideGizmoWhenDrafted_Label: Hide Sex History button when drafted
LanguageData.RSOption_HideGizmoWhenDrafted_Desc: Hides Sex History Gizmo for currently drafted pawns
LanguageData.RSOption_VirginityCheck_M2M_Label: Remove virginity with anal sex (for male/male sex)
LanguageData.RSOption_VirginityCheck_M2M_Desc: Remove virginity with anal sex (for male/male sex)
LanguageData.RSOption_VirginityCheck_F2F_Label: Remove virginity with scissoring sex (for female/female sex)
LanguageData.RSOption_VirginityCheck_F2F_Desc: Remove virginity with scissoring sex (for female/female sex)
